raw_text: REV. Fr. NALIN SURAJA of the Archdiocese of Colombo,​ expired on Monday,​ the 30th October 2023. He was the beloved son of H.D. Edwin Joseph and W.D. Irangani Mallika. His remains will lie in state at St. Anthony’s Church,​ Kongodamulla,​ on Wednesday,​ 1st November from 10 a.m. to 12.30 p.m. and thereafter transferred to Our Lady of Good Voyage Church,​ Duwa. On Thursday,​ 2nd November at 7.00 p.m. his remains will be taken to St. Joseph’s Church,​ Pamunugama. The Requiem Mass will be held on Friday,​ the 3rd November at 9.30 a.m. followed by burial at the Church Cemetery at Pamunugama.070000

REV. SISTER MARIE PHYLLIS RODRIGO expired. Her mortal remains laid to rest at St. Agnes’ Convent,​ Bolawalana,​ Negombo on Wednesday 1st November and thereafter will be taken to Good Shepherd Convent,​ Nayakakanda on Thursday 2nd November at 9.00 a.m. The Eucharistic Celebration will be at 2.30 p.m. followed by burial.070401

GOONETILLEKE – PRIYA – The family regrets the passing of dearly beloved PRIYADHARSHINI MANGALIKA PERERA WIJESUNDERA GOONETILLEKE (Artist and Musician) – Daughter of late L P and Bertha Goonetilleke of Nadun Grove,​ Mt.Lavinia,​ sister of Ciranti Saluwadana,​ loving aunt of Nadi and Neraj,​ companion and dear friend of Drucille Gomes and family,​ cousin of Manel Shanmuganathan and family,​ Canada,​ cousins UK and Sri Lanka,​ passed away peacefully at her residence on 31st October 2023. Her remains lie at A.F. Raymond,​ Borella for visitation on Friday 3rd November from 8.30 a.m. to 10.00 p.m. Cremation at the General Cemetery,​ Borella on Saturday 4th November at 2 p.m.070319

MADAWELA – DR. DUDLEY MAHIPALA BERNARD (MAHI) – Beloved husband of Roshni,​ loving father of Raghvan,​ Ramnath and Romola,​ father-in-law of Gaby,​ grandfather of Alec,​ son of the late Bernard and Anula Madawela,​ son-in-law of late T.B. and Srima Madugalle,​ loving brother of late Jayanthi,​ brother-in-law of Minoli and Themiya Udalagama,​ expired. Funeral was held privately as per his wishes on the 20th of October 2023. 32/​10,​ Jayasinghe Road,​ Kirulapone,​ Colombo 05.070279

PERERA – KINGSLEY WALTER – Beloved husband of Sunethra,​ precious father of Umesh,​ father-in-law of Olga,​ loving grandfather of Sanshey and Malisha,​ much loved brother of the late Janet,​ late Dottie and Thilaka,​ passed away peacefully on the 1st of November 2023. Remains will lie at “The Respect Home” Borella,​ from 8.30 a.m. on the 2nd of November. Cremation on Friday the 3rd of November at 11.30 a.m. at the General Cemetery,​ Borella.070317
